Voltage¶

class voltage.Voltage(adc_Pin: pyb.Pin)¶

A ADC pin to read the voltage of the batterys

Initializes a voltage sensor object :param adc_Pin: Analog input pin to read voltage

adc¶

Voltage Sensor ADC Object

read_voltage()¶

Reads and returns the calculated voltage of the batteries

Return voltage:

Adjusted voltage from the battery to account for voltage divider

MECHA03 ROMI
